The Sinhala text superimposed on the ima: I have approved, have you? / The gift given to a rapist in India”.
The post: s caption translates to English as: “If this was done in one village, it will become a trend and everyone will follow".
The original photo: published by the Associated Press (AP) on October 11, 2006, shows Mario Quishpe shouting as villagers burn his legs after allegedly being caught stealing in Pelileo Grande, Ecuador.
